Fixed admin.pub to include default public key 'nick@durian.localdomain' matching the ga_apollo_rsa private key. This is REQUIRED now that using ansible 'exclusive' flag with authorized_key, which overwrites existing authorized_keys on remote host with the specified file. This is needed for ansible to connect to system user on remote hosts via ssh.

ansible.cfg specifies an ansible-vault password file .vault_pass which is a script that utilises a bash environment variable VAULT_PASSWORD set to the password once per session. this will be applied to all ansible-vault operations, so that password doesn't need to be entered again.
